GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.14.289
GSD.description:
cgroup: Use separate src/dst nodes when preloading css_sets for migration

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.289 by commit 05f7658210d1d331e8dd4cb6e7bbbe3df5f5ac27, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit f817de98513d060023be4fa1d061b29a6515273e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cgroup: Use separate src/dst nodes when preloading css_sets for migration
